## Crystal Heart\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=1) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=1)\]

Celestial Resort's Crystal Heart is in the _Huge Mess_ subchapter. Advance to the lower path of the two in the upper-right corner. Once you reach and activate the large button to clear the towels, advance not to the left as usual, but to the right. Then, travel up into the nearby stream of water to reveal a secret path, leading back to one of the earlier rooms. Then, go upwards and then to the left until you reach the room where you ran into Theo. There is a path at the top of the screen previously blocked by towels; dash up to this path and follow it to find this chapter's Crystal Heart (entitled Scattered and Lost).

## Cassette Tape\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=2) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=2)\]

The Cassette room is hidden to the left of the key found in the seventh room of _Elevator Shaft_ through a hole in the wall with light protruding through it.

## Strawberries\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=3) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=3)\]

### Start\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=4) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=4)\]

There are 11 strawberries in this subchapter (not including the golden strawberry which spawns in the first room).

#### Berry 1\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=5) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=5)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/a/a4/Celestial_Resort_berry_1.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_1.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_1.jpg)

This strawberry floats low in the air below the second moving dust bunny. Stay bouncing on the spring until the moving dust bunny is at its highest, then move right and grab the wall after grabbing the berry and climb up.

#### Berry 2\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=6) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=6)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/2/2c/Celestial_Resort_berry_2.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_2.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_2.jpg)

In the third room, this berry is only accessible by exploiting screen transitions. At the end of the room, go back left over the roof and back at the left you can see the strawberry hovering around spikes. Dash diagonally back and forth through this room and the one to the left to reach the platform. Walk off the platform to hit the strawberry then dash left.

#### Berry 3\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=7) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=7)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/b/bb/Celestial_Resort_berry_3.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_3.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_3.jpg)

In the sixth room, this strawberry is floating near a cluster of dust bunnies. Stand on the fourth floating platform (at the top-left of the dust bunnies) and walk off to the right when the circling dust bunny moves past the bottom-right of Madeline, then dash straight left to land on the green platform.

#### Berry 4\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=8) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=8)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/8/88/Celestial_Resort_berry_4.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_4.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_4.jpg)

A hidden area can be found by walking through the bottom-left of the eighth room (which has the second key). In the room you arrive in, walk into the spring on the floor and grab onto the falling platform. When this platform starts falling, jump and grab the next falling platform, then do it again for the last one. Dash left after this third platform started to fall. This strawberry is in the room to the left. Jump left when the moving dust bunny on the right is moving up, wait a bit, then jump left again and dash directly left without touching the disappearing platform. Then, jump off the wall after claiming the strawberry and you can make it back by jumping and dashing.

#### Berry 5\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=9) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=9)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/e/ef/Celestial_Resort_berry_5.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_5.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_5.jpg)

To get to this berry, follow the same route as the previous berry. A smashable wall is on the ceiling of the room where the 4th berry is located in, so dash into this ceiling to continue. In the next room, jump and dash straight left to get past the narrow gap with the dust bunnies. Touch the dash crystal and make your way up the corridor, then dash to the left at the top and slide down the left wall, jumping before you land in the dust bunnies, and do the same for the wall you land at. After transitioning from a previous room, complete another room. Dash directly into both dash crystals and wait before dashing the last time underneath the floating dust bunny. After this, go left to find the strawberry on a balcony over a previous room.

#### Berry 6\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=10) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=10)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/9/98/Celestial_Resort_berry_6.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_6.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_6.jpg)

In the ninth room, a vertical transition is to the top-left of where Mr. Oshiro is waiting. Wait on the last sinking platform to jump to the floating platform furthest to the right, then climb up and jump off the right side and dash diagonally upward to the right to climb the corridor. In this room above, the strategy is just dashing directly into every dash crystal. Slide down the right wall to grab the strawberry and jump off the wall, then dash left to get back to safety.

#### Berry 7\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=11) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=11)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/d/d3/Celestial_Resort_berry_7.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_7.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_7.jpg)

A winged strawberry is at the end of the eleventh room. Climb the first platform and jump over to get to the next one. Jump to the third platform to climb up and jump over it, then stick to the right side of the fourth platform and jump off. From there, grab the berry.

#### Berry 8\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=12) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=12)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/d/da/Celestial_Resort_berry_8.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_8.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_8.jpg)

In the fourteenth room, this strawberry is floating underneath the leftmost sinking platform. Aim to run off the platform while both circling dust bunnies are far away and grab the wall until you're comfortable dashing out of the pit to climb to safety.

#### Berry 9\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=13) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=13)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/e/e6/Celestial_Resort_berry_9.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_9.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_9.jpg)

In the fifteenth room, a hidden path is above where you start. Upon entering the room, first walk into the hole and dash to the left to land on the platform. Go right, dash left again, and slide down the wall to then jump off and land on a lower platform. Jump into the gap in-between the dust bunnies and dash left, then you can reach the strawberry. To get out of the area, start climbing the left wall and dash to any nearby disappearing platform to refresh your stamina when needed.

#### Berry 10\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=14) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=14)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/3/37/Celestial_Resort_berry_10.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_10.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_10.jpg)

This strawberry is floating at the top over spikes. From the start of the room, jump across the first set of dust bunnies and climb the wall you reach. Jump off this wall and dash over the next wall to reach the next platform. Jump to the floating platform and then jump at the top to the other side, then wall jump to the other floating platform. Then, jump to the platform that the berry is hovering over, then jump up and dash to the left. To survive, wall jump off the right side of the very first wall you climbed over and climb up right left side of the wall opposite of it. To continue the room without dying, do a wall jump off the left and dash diagonally up-right to grab the rightmost floating platform, then jump over to move on.

#### Berry 11\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=15) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=15)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/2/29/Celestial_Resort_berry_11.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_11.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_11.jpg)

On the right side of the fifteenth room, a smashable wall is located on the floor. This will take you to a spot above a previous room with two moving dust bunnies in a narrow corridor. Start running right as soon as the dust bunny on the floor starts moving right, then shortly after jump and dash right to reach the berry. Standing on the elevated floor where the strawberry resided, dash to the left as soon as the moving dust bunny on the floor starts moving right and continue left quickly to get out.

### Huge Mess\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=16) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=16)\]

There are 7 strawberries found in this subchapter.

#### Berry 12\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=17) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=17)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/0/0d/Celestial_Resort_berry_12.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_12.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_12.jpg)

The third room of the green path will have this strawberry hovering near dust bunnies and moving dust bunnies. Walk off the ledge while the dust bunny on the right is also going down, and touch the strawberry. Then, quickly dash diagonally up-right and jump off the right wall to cling onto the floating platform. Do a jump straight up and either walljump off the upper area on the right or climb up it to get to safety.

#### Berry 13\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=18) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=18)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/b/bf/Celestial_Resort_berry_13.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_13.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_13.jpg)

This berry is located in the fifth room of the green path at the bottom-right. To get it, slide down the wall and dash to the right to grab the floating platform. Climb up and jump over the top of the platform to get the strawberry and then start climbing up the right side of the platform jump over it again and, when your hitbox is inside the dash crystal, dash straight to the left and then dash left again. Finish the room normally to claim the berry.

#### Berry 14\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=19) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=19)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/2/25/Celestial_Resort_berry_14.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_14.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_14.jpg)

This winged strawberry is protected by dust bunnies in the third room of the purple path. To get to this berry, jump onto each pillar when the dust bunny is moving up and hold onto the sides until the next one does the same (if clutter remains, you can stand on it instead of clinging to the wall). Dash at the end to cause the winged strawberry to fly up, then jump into it to grab it.

#### Berry 15\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=20) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=20)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/9/9c/Celestial_Resort_berry_15.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_15.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_15.jpg)

In the fifth room of the purple path is a strawberry hiding behind some foreground water. Walk off the right side of the floating platform, dash directly left, and climb up to finish the room.

#### Berry 16\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=21) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=21)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/1/11/Celestial_Resort_berry_16.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_16.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_16.jpg)

A right transition is in the second (third if counting the room shared with the platform-rearranging button's room) room of the brown path. In the room you enter is the strawberry surrounded by trigger spikes. Climb the first pillar of boxes and dash right after jumping from the apex of your climb to land on another set of boxes. Jump and dash from there to the right again, then climb the right wall to collect the berry. When you fall below the set of boxes to the left of the berry, dash directly left to land on the part of the previously stepped-on set of boxes. Jump left to the first set of boxes and dash left over the dust bunnies at the beginning to claim the strawberry.

#### Berry 17\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=22) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=22)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/9/97/Celestial_Resort_berry_17.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_17.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_17.jpg)

In the fifth room of the brown path, the path to the strawberry is on the left. Walljump up the first section while dodging moving dust bunnies and dash diagonally up-left to avoid touching as many dust bunny-spawning tiles as possible. Wall jump up the second section to grab the strawberry, then dash to the right or up-right when falling back down. Then, safely exit the first section and go through the door.

#### Berry 18\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=23) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=23)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/6/66/Celestial_Resort_berry_18.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_18.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_18.jpg)

After pressing any clutter switch, return to the first room. Then, you can go below where the bridge was originally covered and find a room with a strawberry. Avoid the water, as dust bunnies are there.

### Elevator Shaft\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=24) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=24)\]

There are 4 strawberries found in this subchapter.

#### Berry 19\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=25) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=25)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/1/13/Celestial_Resort_berry_19.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_19.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_19.jpg)

First, try to land at the furthest right possible area on the first platform elevated over the dust bunnies, and don't move. Jump up and dash left without any motion inputs. Next, jump to the left and dash straight up to grab the lower ledge. Jump up from there and land on the right side of the ledge. Then, jump left, dash directly upward, and steer yourself right to land on the right section of the upper ledge. From here, dash right into the berry and land in the lower area where you didn't already stand. Walk to the left, jumping over the dust bunnies you spawned earlier, and, from there, jump left and dash straight up to land on the left side of the lower ledge. Do this again to land on the left side of the upper ledge. Finally, finish the room like normal.

#### Berry 20\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=26) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=26)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/9/95/Celestial_Resort_berry_20.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_20.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_20.jpg)

This strawberry is in the room below the cutscene with Oshiro. Walk off the platform right as the moving dust bunny at the bottom reaches the right. Dash to the right to land as far on the platform as possible. Jump to the wall and climb up it, then jump off and dash straight up to grab the berry and then hold onto the wall again. Climb up a bit and then, when the moving dust bunny reaches the right, jump to the platform to make it past the dust bunnies you previously spawned. Finish the room like normal to claim the berry.

#### Berry 21\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=27) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=27)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/d/db/Celestial_Resort_berry_21.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_21.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_21.jpg)

At the start of the long horizontal room containing the key is a gap in the floor. By going down it, a room containing two strawberries can be entered. On the right area, hold onto the wall just under where the moving dust bunnies are going back and forth. When the one in the middle moves to the left, dash directly upward, then move to the right and fall into the gap between two moving dust bunnies. Jump from this wall on the left to the right and collect the dash crystal, then jump back to the left side and climb up the wall. Repeat the first step but mirrored to get to safety and claim this strawberry.

#### Berry 22\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=28) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=28)\]

[![](https://static.wikitide.net/celestewiki/thumb/1/11/Celestial_Resort_berry_22.jpg/800px-Celestial_Resort_berry_22.jpg)](https://celeste.ink/wiki/File:Celestial_Resort_berry_22.jpg)

In the same room as the previous berry, this one hides behind a cloth on the left. To enter the area, hold onto the left wall and dash up just as the middle dust bunnies move to the right. Then, move left to land on the floor below. Jump and dash up when the moving dust bunny guarding the strawberry is moving away to grab the berry, then fall back down and land on the lower floor without touching the dust bunnies you spawned earlier. Exit the area by repeating the process of entering but mirrored.

### Presidential Suite\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=29) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=29)\]

There are 3 strawberries found in this subchapter.

#### Berry 23\[ [edit](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?veaction=edit&section=30) \| [edit source](https://celeste.ink/wiki/Celestial_Resort/Collectables?action=edit&section=30)\]

# Huge Mess

**Huge Mess** is the second subchapter of [Chapter 3: Celestial Resort](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Chapter_3:_Celestial_Resort) in [Celeste](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Celeste). The subchapter's gimmick is having the player go into 3 different sections of the level which each lead to a [platform-rearranging button](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Objects#Platform-Rearranging_Buttons) that clears the material corresponding to the button from the level. The topmost entrance leads to the platform-rearranging button for green books, the entrance below it leads to the platform-rearranging button for purple towels, and the bottommost entrance leads to the platform-rearranging button for brown boxes. Theo can be seen here trying to enter the vents at the start of the purple path. Alongside platform-rearranging buttons, this subchapter also introduces water. The [Crystal Heart](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Crystal_Heart_Guide) of Chapter 3 can be obtained in this subchapter. There is a [Pico-8](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Celeste_Classic) machine found in the other entrance on the right side of the huge room in a secret area, which allows you to play Celeste Classic and unlock it permanently on the main menu.

## **Gameplay**\[\]

The first room of the subchapter has Madeline cross a bridge of the 3 materials to talk to [Mr. Oshiro](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Mr._Oshiro) once again, and then the next room is the main hub for the huge mess. Shimmer blocks return for a more noteworthy use as they block the entrances to the 3 main paths until the player goes to talk to Mr. Oshiro, who is stressing out over the clutter. Madeline then volunteers to help clean up and the shimmer blocks all disappear. After finishing an area, the player must talk to Mr. Oshiro again to remove the shimmer blocks again. The shimmer block for an area that has already been completed won't disappear.

The player is free to go to the 3 paths in any order they wish, however pressing a platform-rearranging button will change the layout of the rooms in the other paths to make some rooms easier and some rooms harder. For an order that minimizes the amount of very hard rooms, take the top (green) path first, then middle (purple), and lastly bottom (brown). This is of course just a recommendation and not the required route.

The green path has fairly simple rooms when done first. In the second room, jump and dash directly right once the moving sludge is going down and repeat this again for the second one. In the fifth room, if you already removed the purple towels, then moving yourself to right to cling onto the wall and climb up it before jumping to the left is needed.

The purple path is very safe with all materials intact, but the second room with the brown boxes already removed is made much harder and riskier, so it's best to avoid that. With the brown boxes removed, try to jump and dash right quickly as soon as the moving sludges move up. With the brown boxes, you can ignore the jump and dash right away. In the fifth room on this path, slide down the first wall and then dash right. If you have removed the green books already, then hold onto the wall and jump when the moving sludge moves up and then jump again quickly to climb the wall of purple towels. From here it's recommended to just land on top of the pillars as soon as the moving sludge gets off the floor and get to the bottom when both moving sludges on the left side are moving outward.

For the second room in the brown path (2 rooms after the room where you can see the platform-rearranging button), your dash timing must be very good. Dash right to go against when the first moving sludge goes left and then quickly jump on the ledge as the next moving sludge goes up. If the purple towels are still there, you can land on them for safety but if not then just dash right when you pass under the box attached to the ceiling. From there climb up and land on the floor above and go quickly through both moving sludges at the bottom, dashing directly downward if needed.

The Crystal Heart of this chapter can be seen underneath the normal area in the second room of the green path. In order to get the Crystal Heart, you have to find a secret area in the room with the purple towels platform-rearranging button. After hitting this button, there is a secret tunnel found by dashing up where the water is flowing down on the right. Entering this will take you back to previous parts of the section, but with purple towels now gone. Once you make it back to the first room, another secret tunnel must be uncovered which is located in a gap in the ceiling above where Theo's cutscene takes place. This tunnel usually is blocked by purple towels. After entering it, the room after spawns you right next to the Crystal Heart.

The Pico-8 machine can be unlocked by going to the third exit from the top on the right side of the main huge mess hub room. In this room is a letter to the hotel staff, and to the top-left of it is a secret tunnel which will bring you to the machine.

### **Strawberries**\[\]

There are 7 Strawberries found in this subchapter.

Berry 1

The third room of the green path will have this Strawberry found hovering near dust bunnies and moving sludges. This berry is deceptively tricky and will take a bit of trial and error. Walk off the ledge at the same time the moving sludge on the right is also going down and touch the Strawberry. Then, quickly dash diagonally up-right and wall jump off the right wall to cling onto the floating platform. Do a jump straight up and either wall jump off the upper area on the right or climb up it to get to safety.

Berry 2

This berry is located in the fifth room of the green path at the bottom-right. To get it, slide down the wall and dash to the right to grab the floating platform. Climb up and jump over the top of the platform to get the Strawberry and then start climbing up the right side of the platform jump over it again and, when your hitbox is inside the dash crystal, dash straight to the left and then dash left again. Finish the room like normally from here to claim the berry.

Berry 3

This Winged Strawberry can be found protected by dust bunnies in the third room of the purple path. To get to this berry is just jumping onto each pillar when the moving sludge is moving up and holding onto the sides until the next one does the same (if green books or brown boxes still remain, those can be stood on instead of clinging to the wall). You need to do a dash at the end to cause the Winged Strawberry to fly up, then jump into it to grab it.

Berry 4

In the fifth room of the purple path is a Strawberry hiding behind some foreground water. This one is simple to get, just walk off the right side of the floating platform, dash directly left, and climb up to finish the room.

Berry 5

A right transition can be found in the second (third if counting the room shared with the platform-rearranging button's room) room of the brown path. In the room you enter is the Strawberry surrounded on all sides with sludge-spawning tiles. What you should do is climb the first pillar of boxes and dash right after jumping from the apex of your climb to land on another set of boxes. Jump and dash from there to the right again, then climb the right wall to collect the berry. When you fall below the set of boxes to the left of the berry, dash directly left to land on the part of the previously stepped on set of boxes. Jump left to the first set of boxes and dash left over the dust bunnies at the beginning to claim the Strawberry.

Berry 6

In the fifth room of the brown path, the path to the Strawberry can be seen on the left. Wall jump up the first section while dodging moving sludges and dash diagonally up-left to avoid touching as many sludge-spawning tiles as possible. Wall jump up the second section to grab the Strawberry, then dash to the right or up-right when falling back down. Then, safely exit the first section and go through the door.

Berry 7

By going back to the first room of the subchapter after pressing any of the platform-rearranging buttons, you can go below where the bridge originally covered and find a room with a Strawberry in it. Just make sure not to go in the water, as dust bunnies are there.

# Golden Strawberries Guide

[Sign in to edit](https://auth.fandom.com/signin?redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fcelestegame.fandom.com%2Fwiki%2FGolden_Strawberries_Guide%3Fveaction%3Dedit&uselang=en)

Golden Strawberries become available to collect in each chapter after completing [Chapter 8: Core](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Chapter_8:_Core) B-Side. Each Golden Berry requires the player to finish a chapter without dying in order to be collected. If the player dies, they will be sent back to the room with the Golden Strawberry. This room is usually the first in the chapter, with the exception of [Chapter 6: Reflection](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Chapter_6:_Reflection) A-Side, all sides of [Chapter 8: Core](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Chapter_8:_Core), and [Chapter 9: Farewell](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Chapter_9:_Farewell). In these levels, as well as the A and B-sides of [Chapter 7: The Summit](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Chapter_7:_The_Summit), starting from these Golden Strawberries will not give the player a clear time, although earning the Strawberry will set the player's lowest-death record to 0.

Golden Strawberries tend to require a lot of practice. The main difference between regular play and attempting to obtain Golden Strawberries is that in regular play, many players will take a trial and error approach. This means that these players may clear harder rooms by luck or by methods that are easily forgettable.

Relying on luck, however, can only take the player so far. This guide aims to provide strategies which help individual screens to be completed faster and, above all, more consistently. Some of these may use advanced movement. General knowledge of the game mechanics and being able to consistently pull off wavedashes and hyperdashes, among other tricks, certainly helps. If you are unfamiliar with advanced movement techniques, it is advised to check out the [Moves](https://celestegame.fandom.com/wiki/Moves) page.

It's good to know the route ahead of time, so a player does not unnecessarily risk going into rooms outside the main path; therefore, a practice run of the longer chapters can help prepare for the task at hand.
